channel.title: SMF Modifications
channel.description:
I couldn't find anything about it on their site, which is surprising at the least, but I wanted to know if anyone knew how to change a board title link into something other than... The board it's supposed to be linked too.
My "Linkies" section is far to retarded and I found a mod that has a more organized link management. So, I think that would be better. :]

item.title: SMF Modifications
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

You should just find out where the titles etc are stored, and then edit them. A bulk searcher would be nice

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Modifications
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Looking into the MySQL DB was the first thing I looked into, but I can’t seem to find the boards themselves.

And, about the eregi(), I’m not to sure what you’re asking. I don’t know how to run the content through that if it’s already been loaded.

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Modifications
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

just run phpmyadmin and change the url, should work (I’m not really known with smf) If that doesn’t work, find the include where it is stored in. If that didn’t work too (jezus smf sux!) add eregi() to the top of your page

Read full topic
